class_notes: Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required
course_description: Pre-Requisites: AEPI 530D, AEPI 534D, BIOS 516D, BIOS 517D as prerequisites or by special permission to enroll. Methods for analyzing multivariable data in order to evaluate epidemiological research relationships between exposure and disease variables. Includes logistic regression (conditional and unconditional), risk ratio regression, risk difference regression, and survival analysis.
prerequisites: AEPI 530D and AEPI 534D and BIOS 516D and BIOS 517D as prerequisites or special permission required to enroll.
